scripts.test: esy build && sh -c "$(esy x which Hello) drafts"
scripts.start: env DRAFTS=true watchexec -w test/poems -w lib -w bin -w test/posts npm run build
scripts.pub: npm run build && rsync -r test/pages/ test/publish && rsync -r test/images/ test/publish/images && rsync -r test/assets/ test/publish/assets && cd test/publish && git add .
scripts.build: esbuild --bundle bin/Build.ts --external:markdown-it-prism --platform=node --sourcemap=inline > ok.js && node --enable-source-maps ok.js && rm ok.js
scripts.upload: env DRAFTS=true UPLOAD_GISTS=true npm run build
